attributes.action: Make Saturday the 23rd May 2020 an extra Christmas Day
attributes.additional_details: Make Saturday the 23rd May 2020 an extra Christmas Day. maybe make it a bank holiday. even though its a Saturday.
attributes.background: Make Saturday the 23rd May 2020 an extra Christmas Day

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do to make the 23rd of May an extra Christmas day. 

We have lots of petitions about bank holidays. You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&q=bank+holiday
